attributes.action: Reject bailout for Jag/Landrover group Untill Tata group commits to not sponsering Ferrari in F1 next year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reject the bailout to Jag/Landrover group until TATA group the parent company of Jag/Landrover commits to not wasting money sponsoring Ferrari in F1 next year.
